articles.title: Bill with tax credits for 'North American' electric vehicles passes in U.S. Senate - Canada News - Castanet.net
articles.description: The new plan to encourage Americans to buy more electric vehicles built in North America, instead of just the United States, has cleared its tallest hurdle.
